title: CxHy gases - greatest gas density in g/L

content.description: Refer to three gases in identical rigid containers under the conditions given in the table below.
content.question: The density of the gas, in g/L, is

choices.label: the same in all three containers

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
